name: Knockout (BlueDragonStudios)
description:
Controls

Player 1 - WASD Keys to move and C to shoot

Player 2 - Arrow Keys to move and M to shoot

Use the Mouse Pointer to navigate through the menu

Gameplay

Shoot the opponent to knock him back

Each Player has an Ammo Bar and a Health Bar

How to win :- If you knock your opponents into the abyss or hit them 5 times, They lose a life and respawn. If their health bar goes down to zero hearts, You win and will be directed to the menu again
